trans-unit.source: Provides helper functions for the process host.
trans-unit.target: 為處理序主項目提供 Helper 函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions> 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application host configuration (.config) file path.
trans-unit.target: 取得主應用程式組態 (.config) 檔路徑。

trans-unit.source: The physical path (including the file name) to the application host configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 主應用程式組態檔的實體路徑 (包括檔案名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The root virtual path of the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的根虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The root physical path of the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的根實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The site ID.
trans-unit.target: 網站識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties from the application's metabase.
trans-unit.target: 從應用程式的 Metabase 取得屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions.GetApplicationProperties%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions.GetApplicationProperties%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Windows security token for the specified application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: 為指定之應用程式的根目錄取得 Windows 安全性語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: A Windows handle that contains a Windows security token for the specified application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: Windows 控制代碼，包含了指定之應用程式根目錄的 Windows 安全性語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions.GetConfigToken%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions.GetConfigToken%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <c>INativeConfigurationSystem</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <c>INativeConfigurationSystem</c> 介面。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the <c>INativeConfigurationSystem</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: <c>INativeConfigurationSystem</c> 介面的指標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical path for the ApplicationHost.config file.
trans-unit.target: 取得 ApplicationHost.config 檔案的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The physical path for the ApplicationHost.config file.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationHost.config 檔案的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The application ID.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The relative URL to map.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的相對 URL。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 相對 URL 的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets the physical path of a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對 URL 的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions.MapPath%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostSupportFunctions.MapPath%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
